description:
One of the leaders of the CGS boys. Within the group he is responsible for a variety of tasks, such as delivering messages and supplies. He admires Mikazuki for piloting the Gundam Barbatos.
2nd season:A member of Tekkadan`s Earth branch, who is renting an apartment with his sister Fuka. With his kind-hearted and caring personality, he helps Chad run the Earth branch.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: Takaki Uno
